channel.title: Hiring a Coder!
channel.description:
Hello, I'm in need of a coder for a RS Private server.
I need someone who can do a wide variety of things, and doesn't have too much trouble with it, I am yet to get a source and set it all up, but if you're willing to help, let me know. I'm willing to give you definite Admin/Mod.
I am also willing to actually pay you in CAD currency via paypal, the payment will be sent once a month. Please let me know how much you want to get paid, and I'll think about it and get back to you.
I don't want someone who's still new at it, no offence, I need someone who knows what their doing, and will add new things to a source, once I get one, and I also need someone to help me set one up.
I will also get a dedicated host if the server is good after the coding is done.
My MSN Messanger address is - leroux_b@hotmail.com
P.S - I'm looking for a server that had most or all of the skills working , a prayer altar (more than just burrying exp), mage, range, attack, strength, hp, defence all trained on monsters, not bookcases or any nonsense like that, normal wilderness without mass-clicking, and some other stuff, please add me on MSN or drop me a PM if you're interested.

item.title: Hiring a Coder!
item.dc:creator: @bane50 bane50
item.description:
@bane50 wrote:

Ok, I’ve sent you a PM, we’ll keep in touch until the server is up, alright?

Read full topic

item.title: Hiring a Coder!
item.dc:creator: @dyde08 dyde08
item.description:
@dyde08 wrote:

I really don’t want to code a server but, i would be happy to host for you, i’ve got
a 8Gb RAM, which is better than most hosting Advertisements. (all i ask is for admin\co owner)

Read full topic

item.title: Hiring a Coder!
item.dc:creator: @fluster fluster
item.description:
@fluster wrote:

I sent you PM. Please read. Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Hiring a Coder!
item.dc:creator: @bane50 bane50
item.description:
@bane50 wrote:

Oh, if hiring a coder isn’t allowed then I apologize… add my msn please, I’ll be on later during the day.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 19, 2009, 04:14:23 pm[/size][hr]Would you play on the server aswell? and stick with it along side me? I’ll get a dedicated host if there server is up to online-standards.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 19, 2009, 04:19:57 pm[/size][hr]Is there a section where I can perhaps post then other than here?

Read full topic

item.title: Hiring a Coder!
item.dc:creator: @theUnforgiven theUnforgiven
item.description:
@theUnforgiven wrote:

I am efficient at coding and have just the server you’re looking for…

But I don’t think hiring a coder is allowed.

And if it is allowed I still probably will help you without the payment…

Well maybe a little bit

Read full topic
